pull.title: wallet: derivehdkey RPC to get xpub at arbitrary path
pull.body:
Based on #29136.

Given a (blank) wallet with an `unused(KEY)` descriptor, `derivehdkey "m/87h/0h/0h"` gets the xpub or xpriv at any given path.

This is particularly useful for multisig setup where it's not desirable to use our default derivations (e.g. 44h).

TODO:

- [ ] update multisig tutorial and demo tests to use this
- [ ] optional `hdkey` argument in case there's multiple `unused(KEY)` descriptors

author Ava Chow <github@achow101.com> 1703276713 -0500
committer Sjors Provoost <sjors@sprovoost.nl> 1750417174 +0200

descriptor: Add unused(KEY) descriptor

unused() descriptors do not have scriptPubKeys. Instead, the wallet uses
them to store keys without having any scripts to watch for.
